```{r getLibs}
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
library(knitr)
```

```{r DataName.pc}
DataName.pc = DataName |>
  select(where(is.numeric)) |> 
prcomp(center=TRUE, scale=FALSE)
```


```{r GetVariances}
DataName.pc |>
  tidy(matrix = "pcs") |> 
kable(caption="Principal Component contributions for the DataName data.")
```


```{r ScreePlotDataName.pc, fig.cap="Scree plot for the principal components analysis of the DataName data."}
DataName.pc |> plot()
```


```{r getLoadings }
DataName.pc$rotation |>
kable(caption="Principal Component Loadings for the DataName data.")
```


```{r biplotDataName.pc, fig.cap="Biplot for the DataName data."}
DataName.pc |> biplot()
```

```{r augmentDataName.pc}
DataName.pc.fit = DataName.pc |> augment(DataName)  
```


```{r scatterDataName.pc, fig.cap="Scatter plot of the first and second principle component scores."}
DataName.pc.fit |> ggplot(aes(x=.fittedPC1, y=.fittedPC2)) + 
  geom_point(size = 1.5) 
```
